customer_addr:
217 Mass Venture Center 100 Venture Way
HADLEY, MA 01035

citations.narrative:
On May 13, 2023 an adult male pair housed marmoset was found out of it's cage inside the animal housing room. The
other animal remained in the cage. The cage door was ajar, due to the coincidental failure of two security methods used
to keep the door closed: both the mechanical failure of the spring latch, and a too-loose connection of the plastic chain
used as a secondary method of containing the cage door. Primary enclosures must contain the animals and prevent
opening of the enclosure by the animal. The facility must ensure that the animals are securely contained by their primary
enclosures.
Corrected immediately upon discovery of the escaped animal on May 13, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.80(a)(2)(iii) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
On May 13, 2023 an adult male pair housed marmoset was found out of it's cage inside the animal housing room. The 
other animal remained in the cage. The cage door was ajar, due to the coincidental failure of two security methods used 
to keep the door closed: both the mechanical failure of the spring latch, and a too-loose connection of the plastic chain 
used as a secondary method of containing the cage door. Primary enclosures must contain the animals and prevent 
opening of the enclosure by the animal. The facility must ensure that the animals are securely contained by their primary 
enclosures. 
 
Corrected immediately upon discovery of the escaped animal on May 13, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
